org.ietf.nea.pa.attribute

Class PaAttributeFactoryIetf

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ietf.nea.pa.attribute.PaAttributeFactoryIetf

  • public final class PaAttributeFactoryIetf
extends Object
    Factory utility to create an IETF RFC 5792 compliant integrity measurement attribute.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static long VENDORID

      private PaAttributeFactoryIetf()
      Private constructor should never be invoked.

                                                     PaAttributeHeader attributeHeaderCopy)
                                                              throws ValidationException
        Creates an error attribute containing information about an unsupported but mandatory attribute.
        Parameters:
        messageHeaderCopy - the byte copy of the message header of the erroneous message
        attributeHeaderCopy - the copy of the header of the unsupported attribute

        an IETF RFC 5792 compliant integrity measurement attribute
        Throws:
